name: Yahoo Finance
description: Pprovides tools to get pricing, company information and more.

operations.name: Get Current Stock Price
operations.description: Get the current stock price based on stock symbol.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Stock symbol in Yahoo Finance format.

operations.name: Get Stock Price By Date
operations.description: Get the stock price for a given stock symbol on a specific date.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Stock symbol in Yahoo Finance format.

operations.name: Get Stock Price Date Range
operations.description: Get the stock prices for a given date range for a given stock symbol.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Stock symbol in Yahoo Finance format.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The end date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

operations.name: Get Historical Stock Prices
operations.description: Get historical stock prices for a given stock symbol.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Stock symbol in Yahoo Finance format.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: The period for historical data. Defaults to "1mo". Valid periods: "1d", "5d", "1mo", "3mo", "6mo", "1y", "2y", "5y", "10y", "ytd", "max"

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: The interval between data points. Defaults to "1d". Valid intervals: "1d", "5d", "1wk", "1mo", "3mo"

operations.name: Get Dividends
operations.description: Get dividends for a given stock symbol.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Stock symbol in Yahoo Finance format.

operations.name: Get Income Statement
operations.description: Get income statement for a given stock symbol.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Stock symbol in Yahoo Finance format.

parameters.name: freq
parameters.description: At what frequency to get cashflow statements. Defaults to "yearly". Valid frequencies: "yearly", "quarterly", "trailing"

operations.name: Get Cashflow
operations.description: Get cashflow for a given stock symbol.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Stock symbol in Yahoo Finance format.

parameters.name: freq
parameters.description: At what frequency to get cashflow statements. Defaults to "yearly". Valid frequencies: "yearly", "quarterly", "trailing"

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Stock symbol in Yahoo Finance format.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: max amount of upcoming and recent earnings dates to return. Default value 12 should return next 4 quarters and last 8 quarters. Increase if more history is needed.

operations.name: Get News
operations.description: Get news for a given stock symbol.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Stock symbol in Yahoo Finance format.

operations.name: Get Recommendations
operations.description: Get analyst recommendations for a given symbol.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Stock symbol in Yahoo Finance format.
